#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
int main()
{
	long long int a[100010],b[100010],i,t,s,n,m,p,q,count;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld",&n,&m,&s,&p,&q);
		a[0]=1;
		b[0]=1;
		for(i=1;i<=s;++i)
		{
			a[i]=1+p*i;
			if(a[i]>n)
				a[i]=m+(a[i]-m)%(n-m+1);
		}
		for(i=1;i<=s;++i)
		{
			b[i]=1+q*i;
			if(b[i]>n)
				b[i]=m+(b[i]-m)%(n-m+1);
		}
		count=0;
		for(i=1;i<=s;++i)
		{
			if(a[i]==b[i])
				++count;
		}
		printf("%lld\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
